verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump confidante Roger Stone] [V: spoke] [ARGM-TMP: frequently] [ARG2: to Trump] [ARGM-TMP: during the campaign] and had contact with Wikileaks . Stone is being investigated by Robert Mueller ’s Russia probe and promises not to roll on Trump .
